body_html: @selcouthlyBlue I am using an implementation very much like @pozhijisi. I need this functionality for something unrelated to CTCs (namely, tf.edit_distance). I think it makes sense for the function to use either eos_token or sequence_lengths (or even a mask directly, as that is what I actually have).

body: @selcouthlyBlue I am using an implementation very much like @pozhijisi. I need this functionality for something unrelated to CTCs (namely, tf.edit_distance). I think it makes sense for the function to use either `eos_token` or `sequence_lengths` (or even a mask directly, as that is what I actually have).
